channel.title: Covid-19 Financial Aid for RPG Creators
channel.description:
Saw [this tweet](https://twitter.com/SeanNittner/status/1265703874901336064) and thought some here might be interested.
"Hal Greenberg, president of the RPG Creators Relief Fund [said they] have raised $20,000 to help creators in the wake of COVID-19."
